common_0060_head_teacher_00:
Right then, dear Pokémon. Time to come out of
your Poké Balls.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_01:
We provide each student entering the academy
a Pokémon of their own.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_02:
I’ll ask you to choose which among these three
you’d like to have as your partner.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_10:
They’re all very good company. Why, they usually
refuse to even leave my side.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_03:
[BD06:0]Hmm. So it turns out they’re more interested in
you, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0], than\r
familiar\r
old me.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_04:
I do wish I could stay and see which one you’ll
choose, but I must be off to my next home visit...[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_05:
I’ll be at the house just over there. Take your time
with your decision, then come find me once your\r
mind is made up.[npcn:A]
common_0060_head_teacher_06: Now if you’ll excuse me. Until next we meet.[npcn:A]
common_0060_mama_01: What a mannerly fellow that director of yours is![npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_02:
These three are all lovely—but you need to
choose just one, right? Not an easy task![npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_03:
Why not take this opportunity to walk about with
these little ones and get to know them?[npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_04: I’m sure they have lots to teach you![npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_05:
Oh! But before you go... I got you a little
something to celebrate your big day!\c
Take it with you if you’re going out on your own.[npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_06:
It’s a brand-new phone!\c
According to the instructions, you can check the
map app by pressing the [clr:6]Y Button[clr:0].\c
It’ll help keep you from getting lost, so take
good care of your new gadget, OK?[npcn:2B]
common_0060_mama_07: Now off you go. Have fun![npcn:2B]
